name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Company Crawler: Find company reviews on Glassdoor, Comparably, and Indeed!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to easily search for a company's reviews, saving you time and hassle while searching for a job!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Searching for company reviews before applying provides you with more insight on the company and how they treat their employees as well as seeing if the company is real.

Scam companies are on the rise and you need to keep your information safe while on the hunt for employment.

Simply highlight the company's name then right click and select the extension!
